subject: "Request for Pending Commission Payment "
description_text:
Dear Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am an affiliate partner currently promoting your brand. I’m writing to
follow up regarding an outstanding commission payment that has not yet been
received.

Here are my details for your reference:

Email: wytchbrittany@gmail.com

PayPal Account: chunhan1980@gmail.com

I would appreciate it if you could kindly review the status of this payment
and let me know if any further information or clarification is needed from
my side.

I look forward to your prompt response and a swift resolution.

Thank you for your time and cooperation.

Warm regards,
wytchbrittany@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Vita Shepp,    We regret to inform you that you have not met the commission payment threshold of $60.

Thank you for informing me.

Vào Th 5, 6 thg 11, 2025 vào lúc 13:32 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> đã viết:

> Hi Vita Shepp,
>
> We regret to inform you that you have not met the commission payment
> threshold of $60.
>
>
